languages.text: {n}Выпалив все это, Паскаль явно успокаивается — цвет его визора меняется на голубой, а мехадендриты перестают яростно щелкать клешнями.{/n} "Донесите своему непосредственному начальнику, что я, {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}магос{/g} Ханейманн, реквестирую немедленную инспекцию".

{n}His outburst over, Pasqal appears to calm down — the colour of his visor changes to blue, and his mechadendrites stop snapping so violently.{/n} "Report to your direct superior that I, {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} Haneumann, have requested an immediate inspection."
languages.original_text: {n}Выпалив все это, Паскаль явно успокаивается — цвет его визора меняется на голубой, а мехадендриты перестают яростно щелкать клешнями.{/n} "Донесите своему непосредственному начальнику, что я, {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}магос{/g} Ханейманн, реквестирую немедленную инспекцию".

traits.locale_text: {n}Having blurted the words out, Pasqal appears to calm down — the colour of his visor changes to blue, and his mechadendrites stop snapping so violently.{/n} "Report to your direct superior that I, Magos Haneumann, have requested an immediate inspection."

{n}Having blurted the words out, Pasqal appears to calm down — the colour of his visor changes to blue, and his mechadendrites stop snapping so violently.{/n} "Report to your direct superior that I, Magos Haneumann, have requested an immediate inspection."

{n}His outburst over, Pasqal appears to calm down — the colour of his visor changes to blue, and his mechadendrites stop snapping so violently.{/n} "Report to your direct superior that I, Magos Haneumann, have requested an immediate inspection."

{n}His outburst over, Pasqal appears to calm down — the colour of his visor changes to blue, and his mechadendrites stop snapping so violently.{/n} "Report to your direct superior that I, Magos Haneumann, have requested an immediate inspection."

{n}His outburst over, Pasqal appears to calm down — the colour of his visor changes to blue, and his mechadendrites stop snapping so violently.{/n} "Report to your direct superior that I, {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} Haneumann, have requested an immediate inspection."

languages.text: {n}爆发过后，帕斯卡似乎平静了下来。他的面甲变成了蓝色，机械触须也不再那么猛烈地抽打。{/n}“向你的直属上级报告。我，哈努曼{g|Encyclopedia:Magos}贤者{/g}，要求立刻进行检修。”
languages.original_text: {n}His outburst over, Pasqal appears to calm down — the colour of his visor changes to blue, and his mechadendrites stop snapping so violently.{/n} "Report to your direct superior that I, {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} Haneumann, have requested an immediate inspection."

traits.locale_text: {n}爆发过后，帕斯卡似乎平静了下来。他的面甲变成了蓝色，机械触须也不再那么猛烈地抽打。{/n}“向你的直属上级报告。我，哈努曼{g|Encyclopedia:Magos}贤者{/g}，要求立刻进行检修。”

languages.text: {n}Tras su exabrupto, Pasqal parece tranquilizarse. Su visor se vuelve azul y sus mecadendritas dejan de agitarse bruscamente.{/n} «Informe a su superior de que yo, el {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}magos{/g} Haneumann, he solicitado una inspección inmediata».
languages.original_text: {n}His outburst over, Pasqal appears to calm down — the colour of his visor changes to blue, and his mechadendrites stop snapping so violently.{/n} "Report to your direct superior that I, {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} Haneumann, have requested an immediate inspection."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras su exabrupto, Pasqal parece tranquilizarse. Su visor se vuelve azul y sus mecadendritas dejan de agitarse bruscamente.{/n} «Informe a su superior de que yo, el {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}magos{/g} Haneumann, he solicitado una inspección inmediata».

languages.text: {n}感情を爆発させて、パスカルは落ち着きを取り戻したようだ…マスクの色は青に変わり、激しく揺れていた機械触手は動きを止めた。{/n}「貴様の直属の上司に、この{g|Encyclopedia:Magos}マゴス{/g}へニュマンが早急な検査を要求していると伝えろ」
languages.original_text: {n}His outburst over, Pasqal appears to calm down — the colour of his visor changes to blue, and his mechadendrites stop snapping so violently.{/n} "Report to your direct superior that I, {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} Haneumann, have requested an immediate inspection."

traits.locale_text: {n}感情を爆発させて、パスカルは落ち着きを取り戻したようだ…マスクの色は青に変わり、激しく揺れていた機械触手は動きを止めた。{/n}「貴様の直属の上司に、この{g|Encyclopedia:Magos}マゴス{/g}へニュマンが早急な検査を要求していると伝えろ」

languages.text: {n}Nach diesem Ausbruch scheint Pasqal sich wieder zu beruhigen – die Farbe seines Visors wechselt zu blau, und seine Mechadendriten klappern nicht mehr so heftig.{/n} "Meldet Eurem direkten Vorgesetzten, dass ich, {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} Haneumann, eine umgehende Inspektion angefordert habe."
languages.original_text: {n}His outburst over, Pasqal appears to calm down — the colour of his visor changes to blue, and his mechadendrites stop snapping so violently.{/n} "Report to your direct superior that I, {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} Haneumann, have requested an immediate inspection."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nach diesem Ausbruch scheint Pasqal sich wieder zu beruhigen – die Farbe seines Visors wechselt zu blau, und seine Mechadendriten klappern nicht mehr so heftig.{/n} "Meldet Eurem direkten Vorgesetzten, dass ich, {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} Haneumann, eine umgehende Inspektion angefordert habe."

languages.text: {n}Sa réclamation terminée, Pasqal semble se calmer. Da visière redevient bleue, et ses mécadendrites cessent de battre l'air.{/n} « Signalez à votre supérieur hiérarchique que moi, le {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}magos{/g} Haneumann, je réclame une inspection immédiate. »
languages.original_text: {n}His outburst over, Pasqal appears to calm down — the colour of his visor changes to blue, and his mechadendrites stop snapping so violently.{/n} "Report to your direct superior that I, {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} Haneumann, have requested an immediate inspection."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sa réclamation terminée, Pasqal semble se calmer. Da visière redevient bleue, et ses mécadendrites cessent de battre l'air.{/n} « Signalez à votre supérieur hiérarchique que moi, le {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}magos{/g} Haneumann, je réclame une inspection immédiate. »

languages.text: {n}Feveranı sona eren Pasqal sakinleşiyor. Vizörünün rengi maviye dönüyor, mekadentritleri de şiddetli şaklamalarını bırakıyor.{/n} "Ben, {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} Haneumann, acil teftiş talep ediyorum. Üstüne bildir."
languages.original_text: {n}His outburst over, Pasqal appears to calm down — the colour of his visor changes to blue, and his mechadendrites stop snapping so violently.{/n} "Report to your direct superior that I, {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} Haneumann, have requested an immediate inspection."

traits.locale_text: {n}Feveranı sona eren Pasqal sakinleşiyor. Vizörünün rengi maviye dönüyor ve mekadentritleri şiddetli şaklamalarını bırakıyor.{/n} "Bizzat {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} Haneumann'ın acil bir teftiş talep ettiğini ilk amirinize bildirin."
